definition: To originate or come from a specific place or ancestry, often used to describe the roots or heritage of a person, family, or object.

examples.german: Er stammt aus einer wohlhabenden Familie.
examples.english: He comes from a wealthy family.

examples.german: Die Tradition stammt aus dem Mittelalter.
examples.english: The tradition dates back to the Middle Ages.
The plant originates from South America.
